meta.author: Marcel Duran (modified by T. H. Doan)
meta.description: Request (GET) a URL and retrieve its content (non-binary) and headers. User Agent string (ua), XPath selector (xpath), and CSS selector (css) are optional. If both 'xpath' and 'css' are provided, then 'xpath' takes precedence. Pass htmlstring="true" to output HTML as a string (default is to return structured data). Forked from https://github.com/yql/yql-tables/blob/master/data/data.headers.xml.
meta.sampleQuery: select * from {table} where url in ("http://www.yahoo.com","http://www.google.com") and ua="Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; Windows NT 5.1)"
